titles.title: Expanding Military Sexual Assault Data Collection Act
Expanding Military Sexual Assault Data Collection Act
To amend title 10, United States Code, to expand the matters covered by the Armed Forces Workplace and Gender Relations Surveys.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Expanding Military Sexual Assault Data Collection Act
This bill expands the matters that must be included in the Armed Forces Workplace and Gender Relations Surveys conducted by the Department of Defense. Specifically, the surveys must solicit information on indicators of an assault that give reason to believe that the victim was targeted or discriminated against (or both) for a status in a group.
